Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor scored the go-ahead run for the Mets in the third inning.
Connor Wong dropped a Jeff McNeil foul ball in the fourth inning.
Luis Torrens tagged a Bello offering to left, scoring DJ Stewart from first base.
Lindor delivered the final blow in the fourth inning with an RBI single.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora said the team is 'not playing well right now' and 'it’s not going our way right now.'
Cora emphasized the need for the team to'show up tomorrow and try to win the game, man.'
Cora expressed pride in the team's resilience, saying 'he’s grinding' in reference to Rafael Devers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox fell behind, 1-0, in the second inning with Brayan Bello on the mound.
The team has lost their last three games and eight of their last 11 games.
The Sox are 13-17 since Aug. 1 and 4½ games behind the final wild-card spot.
